reviewText: very nice and cool package with all alvin & the chipmunks movies. My daughter is enjoying them nicely almost every day.
Spins like a Blu-ray.  Shows images on screen with sound.
my daughter and son loves it i love the fact there is no innuendos with these kids movies and it's even fun to watch as a adult
Fun for the grandkids.  Bought for the motor home.
my son love it
Great movies

Watched these all in one day! My son is obsessed with Alvin and the Chipmunks and was soo excited when I got these for him!  The DVDs worked perfectly!!  I love how they are all on the same container! Saves room on my shelf!  The DVDs are great quality and we had no issues with them!!
Great family movie! Funny for all ages!
My kid loves these movies and this is a great price to get all 3! It made a great stocking stuffer for him!
it has talking chipmunks
What can I say?  I have loved the Chipmonks since I was a kid.  Adorable addition to my movie collection and family friendly so I can enjoy with my grandkids.
Love it!
Good movies 5 stars!!!
These are my sons favorite movies, I was so happy to find them In an all in one, and at such a great price.

Love this collection.
Affordable and great fit in my collection.
sherraydmurray
my daughters love these movies
No surprises here since I had seen the movies on DVD before purchasing these. Obviously, the quality is better here.
Cute movie! My kids saw part one and two on TV and loved it so when I saw this del, I couldn't pass it up.
Bought this set for my 3 year old son & he just loves them!  He has already watched the third one at least 10 times lol
My grandson loves Alvin, so I am sure that he will like the movies.  It was a great price for three DVD's.
Arrived on time and as expected.
I grew up watching Alvin and the chipmunks. I'm glad to have this movie. It will go good with my other alvin and the chipmunks movies. Alvin and the chipmunks is one of the best series.

I hate the second and the third movie. They absolutely drive me nuts and my kids watch them over and over and over... My kids are, unfortunately, who I bought them for and they love all 3 movies, so it was definitely worth the money.
Bluray quality met expectation. And I enjoy the first movie, because, you know Jason Lee is awesome and there's no Chipettes. And my girls love them all, so I would recommend it to any parent with a high annoyance tolerance.
My 3 year old can't get enough of the Chipmunks and of all children's movies, they are movies I can watch again and again (and I do).
Movies are great, but our 2nd movie won't play.
